# Security and compliance overview


This section contains topics related to data handling, security, and compliance.




---

## Links

- [Understanding your responsibilities when using Qiskit Runtime](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/security/responsibilities.mdx): Learn about the management responsibilities that you have when you use Qiskit Runtime.
- [Activity tracking events for Qiskit Runtime](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/security/observability.mdx): Learn about activity tracking events for Qiskit Runtime.
- [Security and compliance overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/security/index.mdx): These topics are related to security, data handling, and compliance.
- [Securing your data](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/security/secure-data.mdx): How customer data is encrypted and how users can delete their personal data.
- [Use virtual private endpoints for VPC to privately connect to IBM Quantum Platform](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/security/virtual-private-endpoints.mdx): How to use a virtual private endpoint to privately connect to IBM Quantum Platform.
- [Understanding high availability and disaster recovery for Qiskit Runtime](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/security/ha-dr.mdx): Learn about high availability and disaster recovery for Qiskit Runtime
- [Protecting Qiskit Runtime Service resources with context-based restrictions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qiskit/documentation/refs/heads/main/docs/security/context-based-restrictions.mdx): Learn about managing context-based restrictions to define and enforce restrictions on resources.
